articles.title: CS2 skin update ‘rug pulls’ collectors as $1 billion wiped from market cap - Dexerto
articles.description: Counter-Strike 2’s October 23 update has sent shockwaves through the skin trading community, with the market cap plummeting by over $1 billion.

articles.title: Mysterious OnePlus phone with Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 and 8,000mAh+ battery leaks with release timeline - Notebookcheck
articles.description: A new OnePlus smartphone has leaked online with high-end specifications. The device will feature the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 processor and a large battery capacity exceeding current OnePlus models. The tipster has not revealed the phone's name or exact se…

articles.title: BIND warns of bugs that could bring DNS cache attack back from the dead - Ars Technica
articles.description: At least one CVE could weaken defenses put in place following 2008 disclosure.

articles.title: 'Sean Dummy': Elon Musk goes after acting NASA chief after reopening of moon-landing contract - Space
articles.description: "Should someone whose biggest claim to fame is climbing trees be running America's space program?"

articles.title: Marvel Comics Celebrates the Launch of 'MARVEL Cosmic Invasion' with New Variant Covers - Marvel
articles.description: Starting in January, new comic book variant covers will feature character artwork from 'MARVEL Cosmic Invasion,' the upcoming game from Dotemu and Tribute Games, made in collaboration with Marvel Games.
